author: Staff Reporter
text:
A man with a gun was arrested by the Kottar Police on Friday. According to police, Ramesh Aron of Sathankulam in Thoothukudi district was arrested at Maharaja Nagar in Palayamkottai and brought to Kottar station.

The accused confessed to the police that he had bought the gun from Mohideen Rasik (35) of Rahmath Garden and Babu Hussein (33) of Bismi Nagar in Nagercoil recently at a cost of Rs. 2 lakh. The duo was arrested by the Kottar police and they confessed to have sold four guns to different persons. Ramesh Aron had allegedly paid Rs. 2 lakh for the gun to them, inquiry revealed.

Ramesh Aron was produced before a local magistrate and remanded in judicial custody. Further investigations are on.
title: Man with gun arrested
